about_the_game:
FleshBound is a fast paced and blood pumping demon-slaying speed running action platformer with a unique “splatterpunk” aesthetic. Traverse unique and dangerous environments by utilizing abilities like dash, wall-run and grapple.  Explore the environment vertically through launchpads and see the world from a different perspective through the gravity inverters. Slay vile demons all along the way. 

You play as Endo, a human incarcerated inside the fleshy walls of a living prison in hell, the Manifold. The sentence is harsh: be cocooned in place and slowly morph into a demon. One day a parasite attaches itself to Endo and begins communicating with him, offering a chance to escape his prison. Run!

Key Features

  • 15-20 minutes of playtime with high replayability

  • A first person action runner in an organic-looking hellscape environment

  • Dynamic traversal through grappling hook, wall run, jump pad, and gravity inversion mechanics

  • A minimalistic gameplay UI

  • A unique intense aesthetic inspired by punk, horror, comics, and older first person shooters

  • A high intensity industrial metal and techno soundtrack

Where did the game come from?

FleshBound was developed during a 7 week project at FutureGames. Taking inspiration from games like Mirror's Edge, Ghostrunner, and Doom, we sought a fast, simple game loop where the challenge lies in mastering the balance between maintaining speed and control.

Leaning heavily on the design pillars of "Velocity, Visuals and Viscera", we quickly formulated the concept and with a visual style we can only describe as "Splatterpunk", the vision of the game was easily communicated both within the team and with external stakeholders.

content_descriptors.notes: All violence in the game is highly stylized. The environments may appear visceral though stylized.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
